divs: Sighting DetailsI stepped outside for a cigarette, upon doing so I had seen the said object crossing the sky towards Norfolk I. A. I immediately ran inside and got my mother who also witnessed the object crossing the sky....I observed it in flight for nearly 10 mins. as it headed towards Norfolk.... living in the area ive become very familiar with nearly all of the aircraft that frequent the skies, and I can confirm that this was no normal aircraft...it had no I.D blinking lights, the size dwarfed normal passenger planes( which I had witnessed prior to the sighting and frequently observe) it was completely silent!
trends: There have been 47 other sightings in Virginia Beach
There were no other sightings in Virginia Beach on or around September 24th 2013
Summary: giant object, appeared larger than conventional commercial airliners....
